## Tales of Gydia
### Play it!
Try our latest release right now!
+ **Windows users**: click on the 'Win executable' button above
+ **Linux users**: build upcoming...

### [Create!](https://github.com/buch415/Tales-of-Gydia/wiki/Create)
+ Take a look at what we have already done: [Content Library](https://github.com/buch415/Tales-of-Gydia/wiki/Content-library)
+ Learn the scripting basics: [Scripting guide](https://github.com/buch415/Tales-of-Gydia/wiki/Scripting-guide)
+ Check out our docs when you need: [Scripting reference](https://github.com/buch415/Tales-of-Gydia/wiki/Scripting-documentation)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Tales of Gydia
